publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2043.2 Mr David Davidson: New Opportunities Fund—As an amendment to motion (S1M-2043) in the name of Allan Wilson, leave out from "endorses" to end and insert "and further notes the arbitrary movement of lottery funding away from community-based projects and from support for Scotland’s vital voluntary sector."
S1M-2043.2 New Opportunities Fund (lodged on 27 June 2001) David Mundell*
